table_description: Player level box dataset, that aggregates core box score metrics (e.g. points, rebounds, assists etc.) and allows for easy aggregation for game/season level aggregations. Use this instead of play_by_play for any overall game level data, as the data is pre-aggregated.

values.column_description: Unique identifier for each record
Unique identifier for each game
The season in which the game was played
The type of the season (e.g. regular, playoff)
The date on which the game was played
The date and time when the game was played
Unique identifier for each athlete
The display name of the athlete
Unique identifier for the team
The full name of the team
The location of the team
The short display name of the team
The total minutes played by the athlete
The number of field goals made by the athlete
The number of field goals attempted by the athlete
The number of three-point field goals made by the athlete
The number of three-point field goals attempted by the athlete
The number of free throws made by the athlete
The number of free throws attempted by the athlete
The number of offensive rebounds by the athlete
The number of defensive rebounds by the athlete
The total number of rebounds by the athlete
The number of assists by the athlete
The number of steals by the athlete
The number of blocks by the athlete
The number of turnovers by the athlete
The number of fouls by the athlete
The plus-minus statistic for the athlete
The total points scored by the athlete
Indicates if the athlete was a starter in the game
Indicates if the athlete was ejected from the game
Indicates if the athlete did not play in the game
The reason for not playing or any other relevant notes
Indicates if the athlete was active for the game
The jersey number of the athlete
The short name of the athlete
URL to the headshot of the athlete
The full name of the athlete's position
The abbreviated position name of the athlete
The display name of the team
Unique identifier for the team
Slug identifier for the team
URL to the team's logo
The abbreviation of the team's name
The primary color of the team
The alternate color of the team
Indicates if the team is playing at home or away
Indicates if the team won the game
The score of the team
Unique identifier for the opponent team
The full name of the opponent team
The location of the opponent team
The display name of the opponent team
The abbreviation of the opponent team's name
URL to the opponent team's logo
The primary color of the opponent team
The alternate color of the opponent team
The score of the opponent team
